Your focus in combat is practically unshakable. While you can act, you aren't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or to creatures of your level or lower using surprise attack.
